"Wands":
"Wands are tech weapons with strong Normal Attacks.

They can quickly recover PP to cast Techniques by striking enemies with powerful area of effect attacks.

<%WeaponActionText>: Switch palettes."

"This explains the Wand Gear system.

When you learn the skill \"Wand Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of your Weapon Palette.

You can fill the Gear Gauge by hitting enemies with charged Techniques."

"As the Gear Gauge fills, a damaging elemental explosion is added to your Normal Attacks, giving you an advantage in battle.

The Wand Gear Gauge empties slowly over time, so keep casting charged Techniques while you fight."
